page.title: 05ART & CRAFT EXHIBITION
page.content: On 12-14th July there was an Art and Craft Exhibition held in St Cyriac's church, Swaffham Prior. There is an exhibition held every year by tradition. A charge of Â£2 was made for visitors to the exhibition. It was free for children and Â£1 for those displaying items. White and red wine was included in the fee. On sale were things like toys, paintings, pottery and models. The proceeds went towards church funds. There was also a raffle. In the exhibition were wooden goblets and old plates. There were also plants and small garden objects for sale. The exhibition was a highlight to the weekend in the village and was fairly well attended.
